ingredients: 8 to 10 American lamb rib chops, about 2 pounds, cut 1 to 1 1/2 inches thick
1 cup yogurt, drained in a cheesecloth-lined strainer or coffee filter for 2 to 4 hours, can substitute for 1 cup sour cream or creme fraiche
8 cloves garlic, peeled and finely minced
1 [3-inch] piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated
